label: 朱雀院
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: The Retired Emperor’s palace, first mentioned in connection with a Retired Emperor who is probably Genji’s grandfather.  For much of the tale it is occupied by Retired Emperor Suzaku.  It stood on a large tract not far south of the imperial palace compound.[源氏、朱雀][RK]
